replace.flavor:
"Carrion! Keep your distance. My blade will come to you!"
—Crovax
Crovax gazed upon the dead, and for one dark moment he saw a banquet.
Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"

"Torahn's horns! They've seen us. Now, statue, you must fight to save yourself!"
—Tahngarth, aboard the Predator
"I got it! I got it! I—"

"No fair! Since when does a bug get ta munch on me?"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

"Ugh! When did orcs and fish start having kids?"
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

"Hold your position! Leave doubt for the dying!"
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight
"Keep them at sword's length!" Gerrard's order fell flat as each sliver's talon suddenly grew longer. "Hold on—break out the polearms!"
